subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The two B.C.S. title game quarterbacks must decide on the N.F.L. draft by Jan. 15, but Tim Tebow of Florida and Oklahoma’s Sam Bradford have different pro prospects.
snippet: The two B.C.S. title game quarterbacks must decide on the N.F.L. draft by Jan. 15, but Tim Tebow of Florida and Oklahoma’s Sam Bradford have different pro prospects.
